languages.text: "Однако команде авгуров удалось засечь слабый сигнал на краю системы. Судя по полученным данным, он исходит от неопознанного судна, дрейфующего на орбите местного газового гиганта".

traits.locale_text: "Однако команде авгуров удалось засечь слабый сигнал на краю системы. Судя по полученным данным, он исходит от неопознанного судна, дрейфующего на орбите местного газового гиганта".

languages.text: "Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a faint signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of a local gas giant."
languages.original_text: "Однако команде авгуров удалось засечь слабый сигнал на краю системы. Судя по полученным данным, он исходит от неопознанного судна, дрейфующего на орбите местного газового гиганта".

traits.locale_text: "Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a fate signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of the local gas giant."
"Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a fate signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of the local gas giant."
"Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a faint signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of a local gas giant."
"Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a faint signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of a local gas giant."
"Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a faint signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of a local gas giant."

languages.text: « L'équipe des augures a tout de même localisé un signal très faible, en périphérie du système. Les données indiquent qu'il provient d'un vaisseau non identifié qui dérive dans l'orbite d'une géante gazeuse locale. »
languages.original_text: "Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a faint signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of a local gas giant."

traits.locale_text: « L'équipe des augures a tout de même localisé un signal très faible, en périphérie du système. Les données indiquent qu'il provient d'un vaisseau non identifié qui dérive dans l'orbite d'une géante gazeuse locale. »

languages.text: “尽管如此，俄歇矩阵班组依然在这个星系边缘发现了微弱的信号。根据数据显示，这些信号来自某艘不明飞船，那艘飞船此刻正在这个星系的巨型气态行星轨道上漂流。”
languages.original_text: "Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a faint signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of a local gas giant."

traits.locale_text: “尽管如此，俄歇矩阵班组依然在这个星系边缘发现了微弱的信号。根据数据显示，这些信号来自某艘不明飞船，那艘飞船此刻正在这个星系的巨型气态行星轨道上漂流。”

languages.text: "Dennoch ist es der Augurencrew gelungen, am Rand des Systems ein schwaches Signal zu lokalisieren. Ihren Daten zufolge stammt es von einem nicht identifizierten Schiff, das im Orbit eines Gasriesens driftet."
languages.original_text: "Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a faint signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of a local gas giant."

traits.locale_text: "Dennoch ist es der Augurencrew gelangen, am Rand des Systems ein schwaches Signal zu lokalisieren. Ihren Daten zufolge stammt es von einem nicht identifizierten Schiff, das im Orbit eines Gasriesens driftet."

languages.text: «Sin embargo, los augures han descubierto una leve señal en los límites del sistema. Según los datos recabados, proviene de una nave no identificada flotando a la deriva en la órbita de un cuerpo gaseoso cercano».
languages.original_text: "Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a faint signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of a local gas giant."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, los augures han descubierto una leve señal en los límites del sistema. Según los datos recabados, proviene de una nave no identificada flotando a la deriva en la órbita de un cuerpo gaseoso cercano».

languages.text: 「このような状況ですが、スキャナーのクルーが星系の端でかすかな信号を見つけ出しました。そのデータによると、そこにある巨大ガス惑星の軌道を漂う謎の船から発信されているようです」
languages.original_text: "Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a faint signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of a local gas giant."

traits.locale_text: 「このような状況ですが、スキャナーのクルーが星系の端でかすかな信号を見つけ出しました。そのデータによると、そこにある巨大ガス惑星の軌道を漂う謎の船から発信されているようです」

languages.text: "Buna karşın alamet mürettebatı, sistemin ucunda zayıf bir sinyal keşfetti. Elde ettikleri veriler, tanımlanamayan bir geminin sistemdeki bir gaz devinin yörüngesinde süzüldüğünü gösteriyor."
languages.original_text: "Despite this, the augur crew managed to locate a faint signal at the system's edge. According to their data, it is coming from an unidentified vessel drifting in the orbit of a local gas giant."
